questions.question: Carbon payback by state?
questions.insight: Coal states have 10x longer payback than hydro states

questions.question: When does EV mining = ICE emissions?
questions.insight: EV breaks even at ~18k miles, then wins forever

questions.question: EV vs ICE tire/brake particulates?
questions.insight: EV weight = more tire wear, but less brake dust (net similar)

questions.question: Lifetime water usage EV vs gas?
questions.insight: Gas refining uses massive water over vehicle lifetime

questions.question: How grid cleaning improves existing EVs?
questions.insight: EVs bought today improve without replacement

questions.question: How much rare earth do EVs use?
questions.insight: Wind turbines use 400x more rare earth than EVs

questions.question: Economic value of EV noise reduction?
questions.insight: EVs are 75% quieter, major urban health benefit

questions.question: EV adoption by income?
questions.insight: Without intervention, EVs exacerbate inequality

questions.question: Charging access: renters vs owners?
questions.insight: 44 million renter households excluded from home charging

questions.question: EV viability: rural vs urban?
questions.insight: 20% of Americans live where EVs are impractical

questions.question: Who buys EVs by age?
questions.insight: Young people want EVs but cant afford them

questions.question: Multi-family charging cost?
questions.insight: 1:5 shared ratio is cost-effective sweet spot

questions.question: When are used EVs affordable for median family?
questions.insight: Used EVs hit $11,250 threshold by 2031

questions.question: EV adoption by education?
questions.answer: Grad degree = 30x higher than no diploma
questions.insight: Education gap is largely income-driven

questions.question: EV sales prediction model accuracy?
questions.insight: Battery cost most predictive feature

questions.question: Gas price prediction accuracy?
questions.insight: Oil price is 80% of prediction power

questions.question: Battery degradation prediction accuracy?
questions.insight: Temperature is most damaging factor

questions.question: Charging demand prediction accuracy?
questions.insight: Peak demand is 5x off-peak (6-9PM)

questions.question: User likely to buy EV classifier?
questions.insight: Income > $100k + homeowner = 85% EV likelihood

questions.question: Optimal charging time recommender?
questions.insight: Model recommends 2-5 AM for most users

questions.question: Which hour does EV charging peak?
questions.insight: Evening peak (6-9 PM) coincides with residential AC peak - worst case for grid

questions.question: Solar capacity needed to offset EV charging?
questions.insight: A 6kW rooftop solar system easily covers typical EV usage with surplus

questions.question: When do diesel vehicles become stranded assets?
questions.insight: Urban diesel bans in EU (2030) accelerate stranding

questions.question: Grid storage for 100% EV adoption?
questions.detail: Current US grid storage: ~25 GWh, Need: 9 GWh
questions.insight: Need 0x current storage capacity

questions.question: Annual savings from smart charging?
questions.insight: Smart charging can save 75% on electricity costs

questions.question: EV adoption % that triggers transformer upgrades?
questions.insight: Most neighborhoods hit this at 40-60% EV adoption

questions.question: Annual V2G revenue potential?
questions.insight: V2G revenue varies 2x by utility territory

questions.question: Charging cost per mile by speed?
questions.insight: Fast charging costs 4-5x more per mile than home charging

questions.question: Can EVs absorb California curtailed renewables?
questions.insight: Smart charging could eliminate most renewable waste

questions.question: Cleanest hour for EV charging?
questions.insight: Midday charging (10am-3pm) is 50% cleaner than evening

questions.question: Gas price for EV to be rational by income?
questions.insight: Low income needs gas at $5.50+ for EV to make sense

questions.question: When must Uber/Lyft drivers switch to EV?
questions.insight: By 2024, EV saves $3,000+/year for rideshare

questions.question: Worst areas for EV economics?
questions.insight: High electricity + low gas = EV makes no sense

questions.question: Minimum value of any used EV?
questions.insight: Battery recycling creates $1,500+ higher floor than ICE

questions.question: When is EV insurance cheaper than ICE?
questions.insight: Repair standardization + fewer accidents = lower premiums

questions.question: Maintenance cost per 100k miles?
questions.insight: EVs cost 60-70% less to maintain

questions.question: Impact of loan rate on EV TCO?
questions.insight: 4% vs 10% APR = $8,400 difference in TCO

questions.question: EV fuel cost sensitivity to electricity?
questions.insight: Even at $0.40/kWh, EV equals $3.60/gal gas

questions.question: Impact of $7,500 credit expiring?
questions.insight: Premium brands hit hardest, Tesla/Chinese least affected

questions.question: Fleet vs consumer EV payback?
questions.insight: Fleets see 2x faster payback due to high utilization

questions.question: Net job change per million EVs?
questions.insight: EV transition is net job negative in manufacturing

questions.question: Gigafactories for 50% EV market?
questions.insight: Need 9 more gigafactories at $5B each = $45B investment

questions.question: When recycled lithium > mined lithium?
questions.insight: Urban mining becomes primary source by late 2030s

questions.question: US vs China manufacturing cost gap?
questions.insight: US manufacturing adds $1610 to 70kWh pack cost

questions.question: Cost to convert ICE factory to EV?
questions.insight: 70% of jobs retained, 18 months conversion

questions.question: Margin impact of vertical integration?
questions.insight: Tesla/BYD profitable due to 85%+ integration

questions.question: EV components with single-supplier risk?
questions.insight: ADAS and battery cells have dangerous concentration

questions.question: Time to reach 10k/week production?
questions.insight: BYD fastest (12mo), startups take 3-4 years

questions.question: Optimal battery size for typical use?
questions.insight: Diminishing returns above 70-80 kWh for most drivers

questions.question: Best age for battery second-life use?
questions.insight: Grid storage value peaks when EV value bottoms

questions.question: 2030 battery chemistry leader?
questions.insight: LFP dominates standard range, solid-state takes premium

questions.question: DC fast charging impact on battery life?
questions.answer: 100% DC = 53% shorter life vs home charging
questions.insight: Home charging is 2x better for battery longevity

questions.question: EV range loss in extreme cold?
questions.insight: Heat pump + preconditioning recovers 15-20%

questions.question: EV vs ICE fire risk?
questions.answer: EVs are 60x safer than hybrids, 60x safer than gas
questions.insight: EVs have lowest fire rate of any vehicle type

questions.question: Battery warranty cost per mile?
questions.insight: Tesla has lowest warranty cost due to vertical integration

questions.question: When is battery swapping economical?
questions.insight: Only viable for high-utilization fleets in dense cities
